name: Pokémon Existence
summary:
Original Pokémon (only a few families) ranging from Gen 1 to Gen 9. (For now, there is access to 40 families within the fangame).
In total, the game features over 200 Pokémon species, most of them being original to the game, native species.
It features the Mega Evolution mechanics, although the concept has been readapted and is based on the “Divinization” of the species, which are orbs that react to the Vital Particle.
Creation of many new moves with very diverse effects, in addition to a large number of moves per tutor, which gives more variety of attacks to the game.
Within the Gyms, there will be 1 employee who will be able to teach useful moves to the protagonist, beyond those already found as normal with the passage of the adventure.
It does not have mechanics such as Dynamax or Z-Moves, since it does not make much sense for the development of our story. However, apart from the forms by Divinization, there are also several form changes between species, fusions and use of armor (without the need for a final evolutionary phase).
There are several regional forms of existing Pokémon (examples would be Slugma and Sableye).
Improved the probability of finding shiny Pokémon.
